interactivity.requirements: Choose "Yes" during the event No One Can See Us . You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Living " from Ami Arakawa
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Invite Ami over upon fulfilling all requirements.
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Choose "..." during No One Can See Us . Replaced by Failing at Everything upon seeing Living .

progression.synopsis: After showing Ami a tutorial for something he's been wanting her to do, Sensei and her spend time together.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.13p1.
